name: BIKI BIKI FLIP
description:
BIKI BIKI FLIP - The Ultimate Jumping Adventure!

Hold on tight and get ready to jump with BIKI BIKI FLIP, the exciting new jumping adventure game! In this game, you will control a cute and agile character named Biki as he tries to leap from column to column without falling. But beware! There are obstacles in your way, including moving columns, rotating blades, and more!

The key to success in BIKI BIKI FLIP is mastering the jump. To do this, hold down the jump button (space or click) to charge up your jump, and then release it at the right moment to make Biki soar through the air. But that's not all - if you land in the center of the column, you'll earn bonus points and move closer to becoming the ultimate jumping champion!

With stunning graphics, addictive gameplay, and challenging obstacles, BIKI BIKI FLIP is the perfect game for anyone who loves a good jumping challenge. So what are you waiting for? Strap on your jumping shoes and get ready to flip, hop, and jump your way to the top!
